lines.speaker: HOST
lines.text: Joining us now is our guest expert {@guestexpert} {@guestexpertlastname} who has a {!expert-credentials}.

lines.speaker: HOST
lines.text: Thank you for joining us.

lines.speaker: GUESTEXPERT
lines.text: Thank you for having me on {@host}.

lines.speaker: HOST
lines.text: First question, {!expert_question1}?

lines.speaker: GUESTEXPERT
lines.text: {!expert_initial_answer1}, {@host}, {!expert_full_answer1}

lines.speaker: COHOST
lines.text: Remarkable.

lines.speaker: GUESTEXPERT
lines.text: Maybe to some, but when you have a {!expert-credentials} like me, you see this kind of thing every day.

lines.speaker: COHOST
lines.text: Next question, {@guestexpert}, {!expert_question2}?

lines.speaker: GUESTEXPERT
lines.text: {!expert_initial_answer2}, {@cohost}, and here I should add a relevant detail to the case: {!guestexpert_detail}, as I will now demonstrate. (Demonstrates)

lines.speaker: COHOST
lines.text: Final question, {!expert_question3}?

lines.speaker: GUESTEXPERT
HOST
lines.text: That's {@guestexpert} {@guestexpertlastname}. Thank you for your time, {@guestexpert}.

lines.speaker: GUESTEXPERT
lines.text: Thank you.

prompts.description: Write the oath that the guest expert who has a {!expert-credentials} had to swear upon entering their field.

lines.speaker: COHOST
lines.text: {@guestexpert} {@guestexpertlastname} has agreed to an exclusive interview with Telimpromptu News. He is a distinguished professional and has a {!expert-credentials}. {@guestexpert} {@guestexpertlastname}, thank you for joining us.

lines.speaker: GUESTEXPERT
lines.text: It's a pleasure to be here.

lines.speaker: COHOST
lines.text: {@guestexpert}, in your professional opinion, what do you make of this story?

lines.speaker: GUESTEXPERT
lines.text: Well, {!phony_expert_answer1}.

lines.speaker: COHOST
lines.text: (Listening on ear piece) ...I've just received word from our sources that {!cohost_contradiction1}. {@guestexpert}, how do you respond to that?

lines.speaker: GUESTEXPERT
lines.text: Well, ..I uh, (clears throat). It's clear that your 'sources' don't have a {!expert-credentials} like me, or they wouldn't even be asking such questions.

lines.speaker: COHOST
lines.text:
(Talking softly into ear piece)
Really? I don't believe this.
(Talking to guest expert) I've just gotten word that {!cohost_contradiction2}. {@guestexpert}, what do you have to say for yourself?

lines.speaker: GUESTEXPERT
lines.text: Uh....I...{!guest_expert_plea}.

lines.speaker: COHOST
lines.text: Alright, I'm afraid we'll have to cut our interview short. I'm sorry about that, folks.

The guest expert has been found out to be a phony. Write his desperate plea that reveals his real reason for wanting to get on TV.

lines.speaker: HOST
lines.text: We go now to field reporter {@fieldreporter} {@fieldreporterlastname}. {@fieldreporter} thank you for joining us.

lines.speaker: FIELDREPORTER
lines.text: Thank you, {@host}.

lines.speaker: COHOST
lines.text: Whats going on at the scene of the incident?

lines.speaker: FIELDREPORTER
lines.text: Well, {!fieldreporter_fieldreport1}.

lines.speaker: HOST
lines.text: Anything else?

lines.speaker: FIELDREPORTER
lines.text: Yes, we have a quote from a witness who saw the incident firsthand. Quote, {!fieldreporter_quote}.

lines.speaker: COHOST
lines.text: {!host_exclamation}!

lines.speaker: HOST
lines.text: {!host_exclamation} is right {@cohost}.

lines.speaker: COHOST
lines.text: One last thing, {@fieldreporter}. Do you have a message for the families at home?

lines.speaker: FIELDREPORTER
lines.text: Yes, {!fieldreporter_familyanswer}.

lines.speaker: HOST
lines.text: That's field reporter {@fieldreporter} {@fieldreporterlastname}. {@fieldreporter}, thank you.

lines.speaker: FIELDREPORTER
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.speaker: HOST
lines.text: This just in, I'm getting word that we've managed to get an exclusive interview with Detective {@detective} Gumshoe who is live on the scene. Detective, what can you share with us?

lines.speaker: DETECTIVE
lines.text: Well, the situation is worse than we thought, my team has just discovered that {!detective_info1}.

lines.speaker: HOST
lines.text: Horrific.

lines.speaker: DETECTIVE
lines.text: It gets worse. In all my years as a detective never before have I seen {!detective_info2}.

lines.speaker: HOST
lines.text: Well detective, do you have any clues as to why this happened?

lines.speaker: DETECTIVE
lines.text: Indeed I do. A note was discovered at the scene of the incident, it reads: {!detective_note}.

lines.speaker: HOST
lines.text: Detective, thank you for your time.

lines.speaker: ZOOKEEPER
